item.title: ‘SNL’ Sets Cast for Season 51: Chloe Fineman, Bowen Yang, Kenan Thompson All Returning
item.description: Longtime cast member Heidi Gardner is leaving, alongside Michael Longfellow and Devon Walker, while the ‘Please Don’t Destroy’ videos will also come to an end.

item.title: ‘SNL’ Sets Cast for Season 51: Chloe Fineman, Bowen Yang, Kenan Thompson All Returning
item.description: Longtime cast member Heidi Gardner is leaving, alongside Michael Longfellow and Devon Walker, while the ‘Please Don’t Destroy’ videos will also come to an end.

item.title: ‘SNL’ Bloodbath? Hardly. Lorne Michaels’ Annual Cast Exits Occur as Regularly as ‘Weekend Update’

item.title: Cruel ‘SNL’ Summers: Cast Overhauls Are a Time-Honored Ritual
item.description: The changes in the weeks leading up to season 51 are part of a well-established pattern in the show’s long history.

item.title: ‘SNL’ Alum Devon Walker Addresses Fan Response to Cast Shake-Up: “Y’all Acting Like We Died”
item.description: Heidi Gardner, Michael Longfellow and Emil Wakim are also exiting the NBC sketch show ahead of season 51.

item.title: Emil Wakim Not Returning to ‘SNL’ After One Season: “Gut Punch of a Call to Get”
item.description: The comedian had joined the NBC late-night series as a featured player for season 50.
